item.title: Mask public IP from your Home Server with a OpenVPN VPS
item.description: The right picture shows an example service without a VPS (Virtual Privat Server) in front. It exposes the public IP of your home network to the world. The left picture shows the example service with a VPS in front. It exposes the IP of your VPS machine fg. an IP of the Google Cloud Platform. The IP of your home network stays hidden. Setup OpenVPN VPS Instance on GCP Create instance Go to: Compute Engine -> VM instances -> Create Instance
